item.title: Trump Is Wrong to Defy TikTok Law
item.description: The correct and lawful approach would be to ban the app until a deal is completed — if one can even be made.

item.title: A Spiteful and Baseless Crackdown on Homeschooling in Illinois
item.description: The state legislature is considering a bill that would subject homeschool parents to unfounded suspicion and excessive oversight.

item.title: Why Trump Must Tread Carefully in Deportation Cases Against Legal Aliens
item.description: American law enforcement is supposed to be both energetic and fair.

item.title: Men Need Single-Sex Spaces, Too
item.description: Let’s reopen the conversation as to whether men, as well as women, deserve a place of their own.

item.title: New Lighting, a New Roof, and Beloved Treasures Reopen Yale’s British Art Center
item.description: But first, a look at some recent history.
